blimpcontrol.accelerometer

Accelerometer module for the blimpcontrol library.

class blimpcontrol.accelerometer.Accelerometer(bus: int, addr: int)

Bases: object

A class to represent the accelerometer.

Parameters:

  • bus (int) – The I2C bus number.

  • addr (int) – The I2C address of the accelerometer.

get_x() → int

Get the raw X-axis acceleration value.

Returns:

The raw X-axis acceleration.

Return type:

int

Example:

accel.get_x()

get_y() → int

Get the raw Y-axis acceleration value.

Returns:

The raw Y-axis acceleration.

Return type:

int

Example:

accel.get_y()

get_z() → int

Get the raw Z-axis acceleration value.

Returns:

The raw Z-axis acceleration.

Return type:

int

Example:

accel.get_z()

get_xyz() → List[int]

Get the raw X, Y, and Z-axis acceleration values.

Returns:

A list containing [X, Y, Z] acceleration values.

Return type:

list[int]

Example:

accel.get_xyz()
